name: Vegan Nacho Cheese
description: You will absolutely love this vegan nacho cheese! It's super creamy, rich, and slightly spicy. And it's just bursting with flavor! We simply can't get enough of it around here!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup unsweetened non-dairy milk  ((almond or soy milk))
1/4 cup canola oil or olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the potatoes and the carrots. Cut them into small cubes. Cook until soft. I usually use my Instant Pot to cook them.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel the potatoes and the carrots. Cut them into small cubes. Cook until soft. I usually use my Instant Pot to cook them.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the potatoes and the carrots are soft, transfer them to a high speed blender together with the remaining ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the potatoes and the carrots are soft, transfer them to a high speed blender together with the remaining ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Process until smooth. This will take about a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Process until smooth. This will take about a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a small pot and cook for a minute. The vegan nacho sauce will thicken up when being heated.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to a small pot and cook for a minute. The vegan nacho sauce will thicken up when being heated.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with nachos and sprinkle with chopped jalapeños. I also added a bit of salsa in the middle of the bowl. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with nachos and sprinkle with chopped jalapeños. I also added a bit of salsa in the middle of the bowl. Enjoy!

keywords: how to make vegan nacho cheese, vegan nacho cheese, vegan nacho cheese recipe
